comments.body: Prefer a pointer to a local value. Returning a pointer to a package variable here means that any caller that assigns to that pointer will override the global default value. See https://play.golang.org/p/rGUjo2eB8dz
i am guessing this default of 1 is intentional, since i have seen a proposal where we agreed on 25% for Deployments.
Deployment has different requirements for availability and it can also have surge pods (more than desired).
